alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:46AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bay County through 715 AM EDT/615 AM CDT/... At 645 AM EDT/545 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springfield, or near Callaway, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Bayou George, West Panama City and Camp Flowers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
